reviewText: I am a member of the U.S. Poetry Slam community, and it breaks my heart to miss the annual National Poetry Slam (NPS), as I did in 2006! But thank heavens for The Wordsmith Press and their annual DVD anthologies of NPS Finals Night! This one doesn't disappoint, as diverse (and talented!) poets from all over the country share some of that year's most dynamic slam work for all of us who missed it the first time around! Huzzah!

The NATIONAL POETRY SLAM can always be depended on to bring the BEST and the BRASHEST of the Poetry Slam movement! Filmed LIVE in AUSTIN, TX in front of a RABID audience of POETS and FANS, this DVD does NOT disappoint!
